section1.content1: House of Wardians is a strategic fighting game with auto-battle mechanics, focused on managing and evolving fighters.
section1.content2: Designed to offer an experience that's both accessible and deep, HoW combines RPG elements, collection, and customization with an asynchronous multiplayer structure perfect for mobile sessions.

section2.description: Designed to offer an experience that's both accessible and deep, HoW combines RPG elements, collection, and customization with an asynchronous multiplayer structure perfect for mobile sessions.

features.title: Tactical gameplay
features.text: Prepare your team with smart combinations. Battles are automatic, but strategy makes the difference.

features.title: Master your Wardians
features.text: Recruit, train, and evolve unique creatures. Each Wardian has its own abilities to build your perfect team.

features.title: Maximum customization
features.text: Change the style and gear of your Wardians. Explore unique builds and gain advantage with your own tactical approach.

features.title: Game modes
features.text: Compete in the league or challenge your friends. Play casually or competitively — you decide.

features.title: Barrier-free multiplayer
features.text: Face other players without the need for simultaneous connection. Fight at your own pace and keep progressing.

features.title: Constant progression
features.text: Every match makes you stronger. Improve characters, earn trophies, and unlock rewards in a non-stop evolution.

questions.question: WHAT IS HOUSE OF WARDIANS?
questions.answer: House of Wardians is a project born from the idea of reviving the spirit of the classic browser game 'El Bruto' and adapting it to modern gameplay mechanics...

questions.question: WHAT PLATFORMS WILL IT BE AVAILABLE ON?
questions.answer: The game is designed exclusively for mobile devices, both Android and iOS.

questions.question: WILL MORE CONTENT BE ADDED?
questions.answer: Absolutely! This is just the first version. We plan to add new Wardians, weapons, abilities, spirits, and game modes over time.

questions.question: WILL THE GAME BE FREE?
questions.answer: Yes, downloading and playing House of Wardians will be completely free. There will be optional in-app purchases, mainly cosmetic or content-related, but the core experience will remain fair and accessible without spending.

questions.question: HOW CAN I WIN MORE BATTLES?
questions.answer: Although combat is automatic, your choices greatly impact battles. Choosing the right weapon and spirit that synergize with your Wardian’s stats will give you an edge. Learning their strengths is key to optimizing your build.

questions.question: WILL I KEEP MY WARDIANS WHEN VERSION 1.0 LAUNCHES?
questions.answer: Unfortunately not. During the alpha and beta phases, the game will undergo many changes, so progress won’t carry over to the final release.
